label: Instructions
description: Please fill out the following fields to document a **Model Component**.

label: Component Process
description: Select the process that this model component simulates

label: Name
description: The name of the model component

label: Family
description: The name of the component family

label: Description
description:
Provide a comprehensive scientific overview including:

- Key physical processes simulated
- Numerical methods and algorithms used
- Parameter settings and tuning approach
- Known limitations and approximations
placeholder: Describe the scientific basis and implementation details of this component.

label: Code Base
description: URL for source code or 'private' if not available

label: Embedded In
description: Select components this is embedded in (if applicable)

label: Horizontal Grid Descriptor
description: Grid descriptor (if applicable)

label: Primary Reference DOI
description: DOI for the primary component reference

label: Instructions
description: Please fill out the following fields for the **Top Level Model**.

label: Name
description: The name of the model

label: Family
description: The name of the model family

label: Components
description: Select the processes dynamically simulated

label: Description
description:
Brief scientific overview of the model including:

- Main scientific purpose and application
- Key dynamically simulated processes
- Notable features or capabilities
placeholder: Brief scientific overview of the model and its capabilities.

label: Calendar
description: The calendars that define permitted dates

label: Release Year
description: Year when this model was released

label: Primary Reference DOI
description: DOI for the primary model reference

label: Instructions
description: Please fill out the following fields to document a **Model Family**.

label: Family Name
description: The name of the model family

label: Family Type
description: Is this a family of complete models or individual components?

label: Family Description
description: Scientific and technical overview of the family

label: Family License
description: General licensing approach

label: Primary Reference DOI
description: DOI for the primary family reference

label: Instructions
description: Please fill out the following fields to document an **Experiment Configuration**.

label: Experiment ID
description: Select the CMIP7 experiment identifier

label: Activity/MIP
description: Select the primary MIP activity

label: Experiment Tier
description: CMIP7 tier classification

label: Required Model Realms
description: Select the model components/realms REQUIRED

label: Experiment Title
description:
A short phrase that can help in interpreting the unique
experiment_id's.

As examples, the CMIP6 titles are listed [here](https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/CMIP6_CVs/docs/CMIP6_experiment_id.html) in the third column labeled "experiments".
placeholder: e.g., AMIP plus 4K sea surface temperature

label: Primary Reference DOI
description: DOI for the primary reference
